rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3869, M3001}

description: For OCC4091, students will continue to spend up to two days per week in the  organisation or service area where the research proposal developed in OCC3072 will be implemented. This will involve students undertaking a research project, collecting data, analysing data, writing up results and contextualising the results in relation to pertinent literature and the professional practice context. This will provide the context for students to apply and consolidate advanced research methodology. Students will also continue fieldwork activities during this time.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
